input.sentences: after the sun set i decided to go out and grab some food .
there were a lot of big leaves on the trees that i passed by .
when i finally arrived at the restaurant i ordered a big plate of food .
i thought i was full but i was still hungry after a few minutes .
output.sentences: It seemed such an out of the way place to dine.
Even though the ride took forever the greenery of landscape was beautiful.
When they finally sat to eat, each serving of food was delicious.
As always Fred had to take pictures of every entree.
Finally she was ready to demolish the delicious crab cakes presented to her.
